message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd be very interested in. It's worth a lot to me, so I'm asking for $11,500. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $11,500 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $10,500?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! $10,500 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make a deal!
I'm still a bit above my budget at $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $10,750?
